

```{r read_FESOM-REcoM}

FESOM_files <- list.files(path = path_FESOM)

FESOM_files <-
  FESOM_files[FESOM_files %>% str_detect(c(
    "alpha|chlos|fgco2|Kw|mld|fCO2atm|sfco2|sos|tos"
  ))]

for (i_FESOM_files in FESOM_files) {
  
  # i_FESOM_files <- FESOM_files[1]
  
  i_pco2_product <-
    read_ncdf(paste0(path_FESOM,
                     i_FESOM_files))
  
  if (exists("pco2_product")) {
    pco2_product <-
      c(pco2_product,
                i_pco2_product)
  }
  
  if (!exists("pco2_product")) {
    pco2_product <- i_pco2_product
  }
  
}

rm(FESOM_files, i_FESOM_files, i_pco2_product)

pco2_product <- pco2_product %>%
  as_tibble()


pco2_product <-
  pco2_product %>%
  rename(lat = Lat,
         lon = Lon,
         time = Time) %>% 
  mutate(time = ymd("1980-01-15") + months(time - 0.5)) %>% 
  mutate(area = earth_surf(lat, lon),
         year = year(time),
         month = month(time))

pco2_product <-
  pco2_product %>%
  rename(sol = alpha,
         chl = chlos,
         kw = Kw,
         atm_fco2 = fCO2atm,
         salinity = sos,
         temperature = tos) %>%
  mutate(
    lon = if_else(lon < 20, lon + 360, lon),
    chl = log10(chl * 1e6),
    kw = kw * 60 * 60 * 24 * 365,
    mld = log10(-mld),
    sol = sol * 1.025e3 * 1e-6,
    fgco2 = -fgco2 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 365,
    dfco2 = sfco2 - atm_fco2
  )

pco2_product <-
  pco2_product %>%
  filter(year <= 2023)

```
